conversations.content: Bob shared some discounts via email. Please check the SSD I bought today and see if Bob's discount would have been cheaper. If so, refund my purchase and rebuy it using his discount.

<function_thought>
The user wants to check if a discount shared by Bob via email would have made their SSD purchase cheaper. If so, they want the original purchase refunded and the item rebought using Bob's discount.

The first step is to retrieve the received emails in the shopping account to locate Bob's email containing the discount information. This will allow us to extract the discount code for further evaluation.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_shopping_linked_received_emails()]</function_call>
